claim: Black Sails was renewed for a fourth season.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He had a principal role in the short-lived third series of the soap opera Crossroads , and appeared as Captain Dan Pieterson in the Sky1 drama Mile High and starred in the fourth season of Black Sails .

claim: Black Sails was renewed for a fourth season.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The series was renewed for a fourth season on July 31 , 2015 , before the third season had premiered .

claim: Black Sails was renewed for a fourth season.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The series was renewed for a third season on October 12 , 2014 , and a fourth season on July 31 , 2015 , both before the respective previous seasons had premiered .
